mapper.insert: replace into leaderboard(user_id, committed, passed, score, update_time) select #{userId} as user_id, sum(committed) as committed, count((case when (pass_rate = 1) then 1 end)) as passed, sum(score) as score, #{time} as update_time from (select count(problem_id) as committed, max(pass_rate) as pass_rate, max(score) as score from solution where contest_id is null and user_id = #{userId} group by problem_id ) as user_score;
